scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w packages/listener" "npm run dev -w packages/proxy" "npm run dev -w packages/ui"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start -w packages/listener" "npm run start -w packages/proxy"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build -w packages/listener" "npm run build -w packages/proxy" "npm run build -w packages/ui"
scripts.deploy: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push
